citations.narrative:
In the Barn Owl enclosure, the roof was bowed down from the recent storm. The material that had accumulated on it had
been removed, but the roof is no longer in good repair. In the Screech Owl enclosure, there were multiple areas of fine
wire mesh that were no longer in good repair. All enclosures must be kept in good repair, protect the birds from injury and
restrict other animals from entering that may negatively affect the welfare of the birds.

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility has a program of Veterinary Care but has not completed the regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the
dealer or exhibitor by the veterinarian. Regularly scheduled visits to the premises allow the attending veterinarian or their
designated veterinarian to evaluate the adequate program of veterinary care and oversee the adequacy of other aspects
of animal care and use.
This inspection was a site approval inspection.
This site is not ready for approval to conduct activity covered under your current Animal Welfare Act License.
Conducting regulated activities at a non-approved site is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Please contact your inspector to schedule your next new site approval inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative and the director over the phone.
n

narrative:
3.150(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In the Barn Owl enclosure, the roof was bowed down from the recent storm. The material that had accumulated on it had 
been removed, but the roof is no longer in good repair. In the Screech Owl enclosure, there were multiple areas of fine 
wire mesh that were no longer in good repair. All enclosures must be kept in good repair, protect the birds from injury and 
restrict other animals from entering that may negatively affect the welfare of the birds. 
2.40(a) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility has a program of Veterinary Care but has not completed the regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the 
dealer or exhibitor by the veterinarian. Regularly scheduled visits to the premises allow the attending veterinarian or their 
designated veterinarian to evaluate the adequate program of veterinary care and oversee the adequacy of other aspects 
of animal care and use. 
 
This inspection was a site approval inspection. 
 
This site is not ready for approval to conduct activity covered under your current Animal Welfare Act License. 
 
Conducting regulated activities at a non-approved site is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Please contact your inspector to schedule your next new site approval inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative and the director over the phone. 
 
 n
